dmca.title: Czech Software Company Asks Google for 512 Takedown of Slovak Site
dmca.body:
July 24th, 2003

Google Inc.
Attn. Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private] Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

Subject: Infringement Notification - www.desiatimi-prstami.sk

We would like to ask to remove the following domain desiatimi-prstami.sk from your index. It is web site of the former reseller of our software in Slovakia. We do not cooperate with them any more and they are still selling illegaly our software Typing Fingers (Desiatimi Prstarmi in their language) in Slovakia through website www.desiatimi-prstami.sk

Our company has already taken complaint in a law suit against the company NetDesign, which owns the website. Unfortunately such a legal procedure takes more than a year in Eastern Europe.

Evidence
Download the program Typing Fingers
http://www.typing-tutorial.com/download.htm (English version)
http://www.desiatimi-prstami.sk/desiatimi-prstami/default.asp?id=10 (Slovak version
